items.name: Magellan's Cross
items.description: A historical landmark marking the arrival of Christianity in the Philippines.

items.name: Basilica Minore del Santo Niño
items.description: The oldest Roman Catholic church in the Philippines.

items.name: Fort San Pedro
items.description: A military defense structure built by the Spanish in the 17th century.

items.name: Tops Lookout
items.description: Offers a panoramic view of Cebu City and nearby islands.

items.name: Temple of Leah
items.description: A Roman-inspired temple built as a symbol of undying love.

items.name: Cebu Taoist Temple
items.description: A beautiful and colorful temple open to worshippers and tourists alike.

items.name: Carbon Market
items.description: The oldest and largest public market in Cebu City.

items.name: SM Seaside City Cebu
items.description: One of the largest shopping malls in the Philippines.
